original_text: And being not weak in faith, he considered not his own body now dead, when he was about an hundred years old, neither yet the deadness of Sarah's womb:
korean_text: 그가 백 세나 되어 자기 몸이 죽은 것 같고 사라의 태가 죽은 것 같음을 알고도 믿음이 약하여지지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: And being not weak in faith
he considered not his own body now dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기의 몸이 죽은 것을 생각하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: when he was about an hundred years old
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 거의 백 세 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: neither yet the deadness of Sarah's womb:
sentences.korean_translation: 사라의 태가 죽은 것도 생각하지 아니하였더라
